title: Windows 10 and Windows 11 audio drivers arrive for the Steam Deck
content:
Valve recently announced through its official Steam Deck Twitter account that new Steam Deck audio drivers are now available for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Previously, the Steam Deck offered crippled audio support for Windows 10 and Windows 11, with limited support for Bluetooth or USB-C audio devices. Valve has updated its support page with

The post Windows 10 and Windows 11 audio drivers arrive for the Steam Deck appeared first on XDA.
description: A new update delivers new Steam Deck audio drivers for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Unfortunately, dual-booting is still not an option.
